Articles.Content:
KSP Fourm,

When I go to my launchpad to launch any rocket, it shows engine fire for half of a second, before it shows the space center without any ground. I can go back to the space center and it looks as usual. I am in 1028 unmodded. I looked at the forum on how to add images pertaining to my bug, but I can not find out how. Please allow this post to be posted

Thanks,

wwb00
Hiya wwb00, please see this thread and put your images on imgur, your logs on dropbox or pastebin, and we'll hopefully be able to figure this out for you
I rebooted the game save and it worked. It was probably a fluke. If this recurs, I will go back to the forum. Thank you.
I relaunched KSP and it worked as expected. It must have been a fluke. If this recurs I will go back to the forum. Also, how do I change the thread to solved? Thanks, wwb00
You can edit your thread, I set it for you this time though
